subject: Inner class TestCase Doesn't Seem to Work
msgSnippet: I wanted to make an inner class be a TestCase, but when I try to run jUnit I get an assertion failed saying it has no public constructor for TestCase.  I ve
messageBody:
I wanted to make an inner class be a TestCase, but when I try to run
jUnit I get an assertion failed saying it has no public constructor
for TestCase. I've uploaded a file to the files section called
TestTest.java which is demonstrates this problem.

For the time being I can just break my inner class into a separate
file but it would be nice to be able to have a bunch of inner classes
within one file when you are testing one module but would like to
have different setUp and tearDowns for the TestCases.
